scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:features
scripts.test:chunk:conductor: bash ./scripts/run_test_chunk.sh 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @ExcludedOnConductor'
scripts.test:chunk:nextUI: NEXTUI=true bash ./scripts/run_test_chunk.sh 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and @NextUI'
scripts.test:chunk: bash ./scripts/run_test_chunk.sh 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC' and @ExcludedOnNextUI
scripts.test:nextUI:preprod: SKIP_PNC_VALIDATION=true NEXTUI=true ../../node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps/index.ts --require-module ts-node/register --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@PreProdTest and @NextUI and not @Excluded' features
scripts.test:parallel: curl -X DELETE http://localhost:3000/mocks && ../../node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps/index.ts --require-module ts-node/register --retry 0 --no-strict --exit --fail-fast --tags '@Parallel' --parallel $CONCURRENCY features
scripts.test:oldUI:preprod: SKIP_PNC_VALIDATION=true ../../node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps/index.ts --require-module ts-node/register --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@PreProdTest and not @Excluded and not @ExcludeOnLegacyUI' features
scripts.test:oldUI: ../../node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps/index.ts --require-module ts-node/register --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @ExcludeOnLegacyUI' features
